module.name: CSV File Writer
module.description: This module writes incoming events into a CSV-like formatted file. You can specify the list of columns you'd like to fetch as well as how they are seperated in the file. Properties are: * OutputFile - absolute path of the file which should be wirtten * Columns - Comma-seperated list of column names to be printed per event. The column names are taken from the MSDT schemas and correspont to the non-complex entities' names. Two special column names are supported as well: * 'type' for the event's type, e.g. msdt.editor.sxd * 'timestamp' for the event's time stamp Example: "type, timestamp, starttime, resourcename" for msdt.fileactive.xsd
